DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy Fosrenol ( Lanthanum carbonate ) sevelamer hydrochloride reduction serum phosphorus level baseline .
DOC.brief_title: Head Head Study Against Sevelamer Hydrochloride
DOC.detailed_description: To compare efficacy Fosrenol ( Lanthanum carbonate ) sevelamer hydrochloride reduction serum phosphorus level baseline .
DOC.criteria: Adults end stage renal disease receive dialysis Subjects significant gastrointestinal disorder Subjects pregnant nursing Subjects currently take lanthanum carbonate , sevelamer hydrochloride , cinacalcet hydrochloride Subjects HIV positive Subjects clinical significant liver disease
